hrefTemplated.title: templated HREF
hrefTemplated.description: A hyperlink that is a URI template (RFC 6570)

isTemplated.title: Is URI templated
isTemplated.description: Specifies whether or not a link is using URI templates

isDeprecated.title: Is URI deprecated
isDeprecated.description: Specifies whether or not a link is deprecated

queryStringURITemplate.title: Query string URI template
queryStringURITemplate.description: Specifies a query string URI template (RFC 6570)

transclude.title: should transclude?
transclude.description: Specify whether or not a link should be transcluded
